errors.error_description: The example usage code shows literal strings 'username' and 'password' instead of placeholders, which could mislead a user into trying to connect with these incorrect credentials, causing an authentication failure.
correction_candidates: username='... your username ...', password='... your password ...'

// Replace with your OpenReview credentials
client = openreview.Client(baseurl='https://api.openreview.net', username='<your username>', password='<your password>')
